# Installation

Erratum is not available on CRAN yet but can be obtained from github (opens new window) in a variety of ways.

# Remotes

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("devOpifex/erratum")

# Devtools

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("devOpifex/erratum")

# Pak

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pkg_install("devOpifex/erratum")
